snippet.title: The Swordsmen X : Survival | OFFICIAL Dev Diary Trailer
snippet.description:
The Swordsmen X : Survival is made using the Unreal Engine 4, and players will explore a vast open world of martial arts based on the land of China, with a map size of up to 256 square kilometers.
Most of the scene buildings in the game are restored to the maximum 1:1 with real scenes, such as Shaolin Temple, Wudang Mountain Zixiao Palace, etc., and strive to bring players a real sense of martial arts world!
It will be released in 2021, lauching on Steam, WeGame and cube game platforms.

-------------------------------------------------------
SUBCRIBE

TWITTER: @TheSwordsmenX

STEAM : https://store.steampowered.com/app/1588560/The_Swordsmen_X_Survival/
